00063 INT MVacuumHisto_init()
00064 {
00065         hVacuumPressure = new TH1F("Vacuum_Pressure","Pressure (mbar)",MAX_PRESSURE_POINTS,-(double)MAX_PRESSURE_POINTS/60,0);
00066         hVacuumPressure->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Time to now (min)");
00067         hVacuumPressure->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Pressure (mbar)");
00068         hVacuumStatus = new TH1I("Vacuum_Status","Status",MAX_PRESSURE_POINTS,-(double)MAX_PRESSURE_POINTS/60,0);
00069         hVacuumStatus->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Time to now (min)");
00070         hVacuumStatus->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Status of Vacuum Gauge");
00071 
00072         return SUCCESS;
00073 }
00074 
00075 INT MVacuumHisto(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00076 {
00077         // Get the event number
00078         //int midas_event_number = pheader->serial_number;
00079 
00080         // Fill Diagnostic histogram
00081         //hNOctalFADCIslandsReadPerBlock->Fill(bank_name.c_str(), midas_event_number,
00082         //fadc_islands.size());

00084         float *ppressure;
00085         INT *pstatus;
00086 
00087         //  printf("In caen ER!\n");
00088 
00089         char bank_name[8];
00090 
00091         int eventid = EVENT_ID(pevent);
00092         if (eventid != 24) return SUCCESS;
00093 
00094         time_t block_time = pheader->time_stamp;
00095         int time_sec = (int) block_time;
00096 
00097 //      char banklist[STRING_BANKLIST_MAX];
00098 //      int nbanks = bk_list(pevent, banklist);
00099 //      printf("nbanks = %d, %s\n", nbanks, banklist);
00100         //printf("eventid = %d\n",eventid);
00101         int midas_event_number = pheader->serial_number;
00102         //printf("serial_number = %d\n", midas_event_number);
00103 //      char fdate[] = "%Y-%m-%d", ftime[] = "%H:%M:%S";
00104 //      struct tm block_tm;
00105 //      localtime_r(&block_time, &block_tm);
00106 //      char sdate[100], stime[100];

00108 //      strftime(stime, 100, ftime, &block_tm);
00109 //      printf("Current block stored (%d) on %s at %s\n", 
00110 //                      time_sec, sdate, stime);
00111 
00112         sprintf(bank_name,"PRM%i",0); // only one gauge
00113         unsigned int bank_len = bk_locate(pevent, "PRM0", &ppressure);
00114 //      printf("MIDAS bank [%s] size %d, %d, %f----------------------------------------\n",bank_name,bank_len,ppressure==NULL,ppressure==NULL?-456:*ppressure);
00115 
00116         sprintf(bank_name,"PRS%i",0); // only one gauge
00117         bank_len = bk_locate(pevent, bank_name, &pstatus);
00118 //      printf("MIDAS bank [%s] size %d, %d , %d----------------------------------------\n",bank_name,bank_len,pstatus==NULL,pstatus==NULL?-123:*pstatus);
00119 
00120         // By default, banks size is 1
00121         if (ppressure!=NULL&&pstatus!=NULL){
00122                 gVacuum->AddPoint(time_sec, *pstatus, *ppressure);
00123                 for (int ibin = 1; ibin <= MAX_PRESSURE_POINTS; ibin++){
00124                         if (ibin!=MAX_PRESSURE_POINTS){
00125                                 hVacuumPressure->SetBinContent(ibin,hVacuumPressure->GetBinContent(ibin+1));
00126                                 hVacuumStatus->SetBinContent(ibin,hVacuumPressure->GetBinContent(ibin+1));
00127                         }
00128                         else{
00129                                 hVacuumPressure->SetBinContent(ibin,*ppressure);
00130                                 hVacuumStatus->SetBinContent(ibin,*pstatus);
00131                         }
00132                 }
00133         }
00134         else{
00135                 printf("###!!!Cannot find point!!!###\n");
00136         }
00137 
00138         return SUCCESS;
00139 }
